name: URLMock
summary: A Cocoa framework for mocking and stubbing URL requests and responses.
description:
URLMock is an Objective-C framework for mocking and stubbing URL requests and
                   responses. It works with APIs built on the Foundation NSURL loading
                   systemâ€”NSURLConnection and AFNetworking, for exampleâ€”without any changes to
                   your code.
